trans-unit.source: Provides methods to write to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para gravar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento ou fila de impressão.

trans-unit.source: XpsDocumentWriter has no constructor.
trans-unit.target: XpsDocumentWriter não possui construtor.

trans-unit.source: To create an XpsDocumentWriter, use the static <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class or use one of the static <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> class.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um XpsDocumentWriter, use o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A>método da <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe ou use um dos <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A>métodos de <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>classe</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> estáticos</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> de estático

trans-unit.source: The document or the queue that creates the XpsDocumentWriter becomes the target to which it writes.
trans-unit.target: O documento ou a fila que cria o XpsDocumentWriter se torna o destino ao qual ele grava.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Cancela o atual <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*>operação.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*>

trans-unit.source: No asynchronous write operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma operação de gravação assíncrona está em andamento.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> that can write <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects to a document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"> </xref> que pode gravar <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> objetos para um documento ou a fila de impressão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: As <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>gravações ao mesmo destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>como os <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>que cria o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> that can write <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects with <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> settings to an XPS document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"> </xref> que pode gravar <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> objetos com <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> configurações para um documento XPS ou fila de impressão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: As <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>gravações ao mesmo destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>como os <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>que cria o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `documentPrintTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não validar ou modificar especificado `documentPrintTicket` para um determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, use o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>método para criar um <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>que é específico para o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>e é válido para uma impressora especificada.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that specifies the default printing preferences for the document sequence.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> que especifica as preferências de impressão padrão para a sequência de documento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for each document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> que representa as preferências de impressão padrão para cada documento.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> that writes <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> elements with <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> settings to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"> </xref> que grava <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> elementos com <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> configurações para o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grava de forma síncrona um especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe tiver um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona os <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos na origem para o conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos no destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: This Write method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Esse método de gravação será reserialize especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento que removerá todo o conteúdo de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>que não é necessária a serem mantidos pelo [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: O reserialization também removerá todas as extensões do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>marcação, incluindo estendidos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: By design this Write method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Por design, esse método de gravação não chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do documento de origem.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously paginated content from a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grava o conteúdo de forma síncrona paginado de um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref> para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém um ponteiro para material de origem não-paginada e também contém métodos para paginação o material.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grava de forma síncrona um especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref> para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe tiver um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> to the set.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona uma <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ao conjunto.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: A document that is written to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um documento que é gravado para o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grava de forma síncrona um especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref> para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe tiver um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements to the existing set.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona uma <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos para o conjunto existente.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: A set of documents that is written to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um conjunto de documentos que é gravado o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grava de forma síncrona um especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A page that is written to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma página que é gravada o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grava de forma síncrona um especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To batch write a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, use <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: A gravação de lote um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>use <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> que é gravado.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grava de forma síncrona um especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Quando `notificationLevel` estiver desabilitado, o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>copia a serializada[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento para o destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>que criou o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output.
trans-unit.target: Quando `notificationLevel` estiver habilitado, o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>primeiro desserializa o documento, seguida reserializes-lo e, em seguida, grava no destino com notificações de andamento como cada página é a saída.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe tiver um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona os <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos na origem para a sequência de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos no destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed.
trans-unit.target: Se `notificationLevel` é especificado como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, notificações são produzidas somente quando o documento é serializado não impresso.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications the document must be reserialized.
trans-unit.target: O documento deve ser reserialized para receber notificações.

trans-unit.source: When a document is reserialized all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed.
trans-unit.target: Quando um documento é reserialized todo o conteúdo do <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>que não é necessária a serem mantidos pelo [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) é removido.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: O reserialization também removerá todas as extensões do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>marcação, incluindo estendidos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel> the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed.
trans-unit.target: Se `notificationLevel` é especificado como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>o documento não será possível reserialized e qualquer conteúdo estendido será preservado, mesmo quando impresso.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: By design this Write method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Por design, esse método de gravação não chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do documento de origem.

trans-unit.source: An indication of whether notification is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Uma indicação de se a notificação está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously paginated content from a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> together with a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grava o conteúdo de forma síncrona paginado de um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref> junto com um <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não validar ou modificar especificado `printTicket` para um determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, use o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>método para criar um <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>que é específico para o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>e é válido para uma impressora especificada.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém um ponteiro para material de origem não-paginada e também contém métodos para paginação o material.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for material.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> que representa as preferências de impressão padrão para o material.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> together with a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grava de forma síncrona um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref> junto com um <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.

trans-unit.source: This WriteAsync method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Esse método WriteAsync será reserialize especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento que removerá todo o conteúdo de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>que não é necessária a serem mantidos pelo [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: O reserialization também removerá todas as extensões do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>marcação, incluindo estendidos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document with notification option to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Grava de maneira assíncrona um especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento com a opção de notificação para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Quando `notificationLevel` estiver desabilitado, o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>copia a serializada [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento para o destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>que criou o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output.
trans-unit.target: Quando `notificationLevel` estiver habilitado, o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>primeiro desserializa o documento, seguida reserializes-lo e, em seguida, grava no destino com notificações de andamento como cada página é a saída.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe tiver um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona os <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos na origem para a sequência de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos no destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed.
trans-unit.target: Se `notificationLevel` é especificado como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, notificações são produzidas somente quando o documento é serializado não impresso.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications the document must be reserialized.
trans-unit.target: O documento deve ser reserialized para receber notificações.

trans-unit.source: When a document is reserialized all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed.
trans-unit.target: Quando um documento é reserialized todo o conteúdo do <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>que não é necessária a serem mantidos pelo [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) é removido.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: O reserialization também removerá todas as extensões do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>marcação, incluindo estendidos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel> the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed.
trans-unit.target: Se `notificationLevel` é especificado como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>o documento não será possível reserialized e qualquer conteúdo estendido será preservado, mesmo quando impresso.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: By design this WriteAsync method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Por design, esse método WriteAsync não chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do documento de origem.

trans-unit.source: An indication of whether notification is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Uma indicação de se a notificação está habilitada.

trans-unit.target: Os dados que são gravados incluem um <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>e informações adicionais que o chamador deseja passar para um manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe tiver um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements to the existing sequence.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona uma <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos para a sequência existente.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não validar ou modificar especificado `printTicket` para um determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, use o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>método para criar um <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>que é específico para o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>e é válido para uma impressora especificada.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The set of documents to be written.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de documentos a serem gravados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for the set of documents.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> que representa as preferências de impressão padrão para o conjunto de documentos.

trans-unit.source: A user-specified object to identify and associate with the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto especificado pelo usuário para identificar e associar com a operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> que representa as preferências de impressão padrão para a página.

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write*> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*> method adds a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to a document or print queue.

trans-unit.source: WritingPrintTicketRequired enables an event handler to substitute a new <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for the one that is passed to the write operation.
trans-unit.target: WritingPrintTicketRequired permite que um manipulador de eventos substituir um novo <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>para aquele que é passado para a operação de gravação.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: The following four <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> methods do not call the WritingPrintTicketRequired event: - <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md XpsDocumentNotificationLevel) - <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(String) - <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(String, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
